byline.contributor: Coral Davenport reported from Washington, and Laurie Goodstein from New York.
byline.original: By CORAL DAVENPORT and LAURIE GOODSTEIN

abstract: Efforts by Pope Francis to further issue of climate change and environmental stewardship are angering many American conservatives who challenge scientific validity of climate change theories.
lead_paragraph: An effort by the pope to further the issue of climate change and environmental stewardship is already angering some thinkers on the American right.

headline.main: Pope Francis Steps Up Campaign on Climate Change, to Conservatives’ Alarm
headline.print_headline: Pope’s Initiative on Climate Change Policy Vexes Conservatives in the U.S.

snippet: An effort by the pope to further the issue of climate change and environmental stewardship is already angering some thinkers on the American right.
